title: SCF Select Field Fragment
description: Type-specific properties for select dropdown fields

ui.description: Use enhanced Select2 UI (1 for yes, 0 for no)

ajax.description: Use AJAX to lazy load choices (1 for yes, 0 for no)

create_options.description: Allow new options to be created while editing (1 for yes, 0 for no)

save_options.description: Save newly created options to the field choices (1 for yes, 0 for no)
